options.text: Fuel flow appears to be increasing gradually. One way of verifying this is to create a waypoint based on time and use the last known rate of fuel consumption to reveal any trends.
The fuel flow can be confirmed to be different from the planned data. The flowmeters are indicating incorrect values and thrust can be reduced to match the planned fuel consumption.
Required fuel is more than actual fuel, but the fuel flow is verified as correct. This allows to conclude that the difference is due to the wind being different than planned.
